name: My Credit Score is Three Hundred and Sixty-six, but I'm Looking for Love Compounding at 100% Interest!
name_original: My Credit Score is Three Hundred and Sixty-six, but I'm Looking for Love Compounding at 100% Interest!
description:
Romance the Circumstance:
My Credit Score is Three Hundred and Sixty-six, but I'm Looking for Love Compounding at 100% Interest!

There’s no time like the present to find your soulmate, even in the middle of a bank heist!  Be it friend or foe, you’re wooing somebody today! Find love in the oddest of places in Romance the Circumstance: My Credit Score is Three Hundred and Sixty-six, But I'm Looking for Love Compounding at 100% Interest!, a comedic bank dating sim visual novel!


Will the standoffish bank teller fall for your cunning wit and heroic deeds in the face of danger?

Or do you perhaps sense something special about this timid bank robber as he holds a gun to your head?

Credits

Writing - Matthew Vasquez | twitter @matt_vaz_
Character Art - Vivian Huynh | twitter @Krokheter
Programming - Jack Gianduso | twitter@Jackggg21
Background Art, UI Design, Music - Anthony Bonacci twitter @sickofwhite
